FuncDef: The display bgp routing-table relay-nexthop interface command displays information about the recursion of routes to a specified IP address. The display bgp routing-table relay-nexthop interface command displays information about the recursion of routes to a specified IP address.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the mask of an IPv4 address.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Specifies the mask of an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
